details:
This module enables you to disable the standard Drupal login form (`/user/login`) so site owners can prevent interactive logins via the UI.

The module does not sufficiently block authentication when the REST/HTTP login route is used. An attacker (or legitimate user) with valid credentials can authenticate using the REST login endpoint (`/user/login?_format=json`) or other HTTP-based authentication routes, effectively bypassing the moduleâ€™s protection of the UI login page.

This vulnerability is mitigated by the fact that an attacker must already possess valid account credentials.
